title: Depression and Anxiety - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/23/22
itunes:title: Depression and Anxiety - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/23/22
description:
George Noory and therapist Faust Ruggiero explore his research into depression and anxiety, whether the news and social media are increasing people's mental distress, and if anti-depressant medication can actually cure these diseases.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
